attributes.action: Recall Parliament to debate ways of giving aid to Gaza
attributes.additional_details: We must intervene directly where we cannot rely on Israel to lift blockades on aid unilaterally.
attributes.background:
People in Gaza are now increasingly dying of hunger due to Israel’s aid blockade.

Aid is urgently needed and we cannot rely on Israel to change its mind. We want our government send in our own aid by any certain means available - including sending in military-backed airlifts if needed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734018
